portfolio.title: ArXiv Scraper with MongoDB Integration
portfolio.description: Papers are scraped from ArXiv and stored into a NoSQL MongoDB database, ensuring robust and scalable data management.

portfolio.title: Google Maps Scraper
portfolio.description: This script is designed to scrape data from Google Maps using specific keywords, geographic coordinates, and other parameters. It allows users to gather data from Google Maps listings.

portfolio.title: Machine Learning Experiments
portfolio.description: Exploring some Machine Learning Algorithms for image manipulation, creation and reconstruction. Autoencoders, GANs, Cellular Automata.

portfolio.title: Schnocks Digital Atelier
portfolio.description: A set of experiments in algorithmic art, using Kmeans clustering and custom algorithms to convert images into unique art pieces.
